what: Turning groups of questions to long format
title: Lifebrain Global health survey
text: several clusters questions probing various concepts around brain health. linked together naming columns. easy use plotting analysis, created convenience function turn data longer based clusters. turning data long gbhs_long_q() need provide GBHS data function, along indication cluster questions take. example , turn answers question 2 clusters longer. add another set columns data: - key : previously column names - value: previously cell values - binary: binary classification value value already binary.
code: library(ggplot2) gbhs |>    gbhs_long_q(2) |>    ggplot(aes(y = value, group = q18_age, fill = q18_age)) +   geom_bar() +   theme_minimal() +   facet_wrap(~key) gbhs |>    gbhs_long_q(11) |>    ggplot(aes(y = value)) +   geom_bar() +   theme_minimal() +   facet_wrap(~key)

title: Lifebrain Global health survey
text: want reproduce types plots create, also provided package.
code: gbhs |>    gbhs_long_q(11) |>    ggbar(age) +   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 30, hjust = 1)) gbhs |>    gbhs_long_q(2) |>    ggstacked(      pattern = "No|Mod|We",     n_breaks = 5,   ) +   theme(legend.position = "right") +   coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0, 1.1), clip = "off") gbhs |>    gbhs_long_q(2) |>    ggstacked_wrap(     y = age,     pattern = "No|Mod|We",     n_breaks = 5,   ) +   theme(legend.position = "right") +   coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0, 1.1), clip = "off")
